The Bow and Arrow salesman, real name Dargaud, is a vendor who is located in the Ranging Guild west of Seers' Village. He runs Dargaud's Bow and Arrows. ranging equipment shop.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
29 March 2004
(update)

The NPC was permanently added with the launch of RuneScape 2.

21 January 2004
(update)

The NPC was released ingame to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

1 December 2003
(update)

The NPC was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta cache.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Prior to the release of Dragon Slayer II, when the player asked about magic crossbows, he would reply saying such a thing couldn't be made to which the player replied "Ok, perhaps one day in the future I'll get to make magic crossbows!"
